Body:
issuer = 'aaa'
audience = 'bbb'
handler = JWTBearerTest([issuer], [audience], [InMemoryKeyProvider({'001':
    private_rsa_1.public_key()})])
token = jwt.encode({'iss': issuer, 'aud': audience, 'some': 'payload'},
    private_rsa_2, algorithm='RS256')
with pytest.raises(MissingKidError):
    await handler.authenticate({'access_token': token.decode()})
pytest.mark.asyncio
